title: Who is Rain from the I-Land show? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rain was a mentor in ILAND but he is originally a solo KPOP artist. He is a singer, songwriter and artist under JYP entertainment after debuting in 2002. As of 2015 he is under his own label called R.A.I.N Company. He made his Hollywood debut in the movie SpeedRacer in 2008. Rain and Actress Kim Tae Hee married in 2017 and have 2 children. All info from KProfiles. Pls check them out. They have a fact file for many other Korean artists and groups too 😊❤️
